recent.name: VistaGreen Builders Inc.
recent.description: The official website of the VISTAGREEN Corporation (VC) that showcases their company info, and its future projects. It includes aspects that will gather interest to the corporation such as it's mission and vision statement as well as its many services to help better the environment.

second.name: DLSU COMELEC Automated Elections
second.description: A web-based online voting system designed to ease in the current voting process, promising convenience and simplicity for the voters and quicker computations of voter turnouts and canvassing for the COMELEC officers in an effort to be cost-effective and paperless.

vcon.name: V-Malaysia 2018
vcon.description: An event microsite for V-Con Malaysia 2018 that highlights a mix of leadership, motivational and product trainings, as well as service exhibitions. It serves as the one-stop-shop for everything V-Con related and caters to stories, videos, photos, links, etc.
